My Playground My name is Mike Miday
Designer, Developer & Front-End Creative Master

A New Look for MIDAYM A whole new concept for the future of the site.

Its been several years since the release of midaym.com back in 2009. Since then I have gone through countless desings/concepts for what I wanted the site to be. Ulltimately it was the easy of fitting the designs to the backend that was discouraging/preventing a release until now, trying to create hack after hack to enable even the smallest of feature to work with wordpress. This time around I went with an all new approach. I am using a simplified ruby gem called Jekyll to server everything using markdown.

Thier is still much to be done but this provides a simple blog for me to share things with the world so stay tuned for alot to come!!!

New Themeing Project Push to reinvigorate my creativity!

Ok I am really excited about this new project I have begun. I think it could potentially be worth some value to the cloudesphere. So sit back and grab some coffe as I will be breaking down as I go along socheck back often. While I delve into the inerworkings of my creativty on this one.
